sentence.text: Primary ciliary dyskinesia (motile cilium assembly) can manifest in the neonatal period with severe respiratory distress.

We describe a child with motile cilium assembly who presented at term with severe neonatal respiratory distress, persistent right upper negative regulation of protein kinase activity collapse and failure to thrive who underwent lobectomy prior to the diagnosis of PCD at the age of 3 years.

entity.text: negative regulation of protein kinase activity
